segments.text: I'm starting to feel quite irritated by this whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer inefficiency of that overflowing sink is bothersome.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so absorbed in polishing a plate while a flood is happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the water pouring onto the cabinet doors; that's going to cause damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, up to no good, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should know better than to climb on unstable furniture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is just completely out of touch with what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to witness such a series of preventable mishaps unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the soggy floorboards and the sticky cookie crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster zone waiting to happen, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really quite a mess, and it could be easily avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR
